notifications.text: Your application for DU has been submitted.
Reminder: Pay application fee for JU.

universities.name: Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology

units.name: KA Unit
units.details: Faculty of Engineering, Faculty of Civil Engineering, etc.

universities.description: Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology, abbreviated as BUET, is a public technological university in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Founded in 1876 as the Dacca Survey School, it is the oldest institution for the study of engineering, architecture and urban planning in Bangladesh.

universities.name: Dhaka University
universities.description: The University of Dhaka, is a public research university located in Dhaka, Bangladesh. It is the oldest university in Bangladesh. On the first day of July 1921, the university opened its doors to students.

universities.name: University of Chittagong

units.name: H Unit
units.details: Institute of Forestry and Environmental Sciences

universities.description: The University of Chittagong is a public university located in Chattogram, Bangladesh. It is one of the largest and most comprehensive universities in the country.

universities.name: Jahangirnagar University
universities.description: Jahangirnagar University is a public university in Bangladesh, based in Savar, Dhaka. It is the only fully residential university in Bangladesh.

universities.name: North South University

units.name: Undergraduate Programs
units.details: Various departments including ECE, BBA, Pharmacy, English, Economics, etc.

universities.description: North South University is the first private university in Bangladesh. Its business school is the first in Bangladesh to receive American accreditation from the ACBSP.

universities.name: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
universities.description: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, commonly referred to as CUET, is a public engineering university in Bangladesh located in Raozan Upazila under Chittagong District.

universities.name: University of Rajshahi

units.name: Arts Group
units.details: Arts, Social Science, Business, Law faculties

universities.description: The University of Rajshahi is a public university located in Rajshahi, Bangladesh. Established in 1953, it is the second oldest university in Bangladesh.

universities.name: Shahjalal University of Science and Technology

units.name: B Unit
units.details: Social Science, Business Administration, Humanities faculties

universities.description: Shahjalal University of Science and Technology (SUST) is a public university in Bangladesh. It is the first science and technology university in the country.

universities.name: Khulna University

units.name: B Unit
units.details: Arts and Humanities, Law, Business Administration

universities.description: Khulna University is a public university in Khulna, Bangladesh. It was established in 1991 and is the only university in Bangladesh that does not have a formal student politics.

universities.name: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
universities.description: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, commonly known as KUET, is a public engineering university in Bangladesh located in Khulna.

universities.name: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
universities.description: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology, commonly known as RUET, is a public engineering university in Bangladesh located in Rajshahi.

universities.name: American International University-Bangladesh

units.name: Undergraduate Admissions
units.details: Admission to various faculties like Engineering, Business, Arts and Social Sciences.

universities.description: American International University-Bangladesh (AIUB) is a private university in Dhaka, Bangladesh, offering a wide range of undergraduate and graduate programs.

universities.name: BRAC University

units.name: Undergraduate Programs
units.details: Admission to departments such as CSE, EEE, BBA, Architecture, Law, etc.

universities.description: BRAC University is a private university in Dhaka, Bangladesh. It was established in 2001 with a mission to foster human potential through quality education and research.

universities.name: Daffodil International University

units.name: Undergraduate Programs
units.details: Wide range of programs in engineering, business, humanities, etc.

universities.description: Daffodil International University is a private university in Bangladesh. It offers various undergraduate and postgraduate programs and is known for its focus on digital education.

universities.name: United International University

units.name: Undergraduate Programs
units.details: Programs in CSE, EEE, BBA, Economics, English, etc.

universities.description: United International University (UIU) is a private university in Dhaka, Bangladesh. It offers a wide range of academic programs, with a focus on business, engineering, and social sciences.

universities.name: Ahsanullah University of Science and Technology

units.name: Engineering Programs
units.details: BSc in EEE, CSE, Civil, Mechanical, etc.

universities.description: Ahsanullah University of Science and Technology (AUST) is a private engineering university in Bangladesh. It is known for its strong programs in engineering and architecture.

universities.name: Independent University, Bangladesh

units.name: Undergraduate Admissions
units.details: Wide array of programs in various schools like Business, Engineering & Technology, Arts & Humanities.

universities.description: Independent University, Bangladesh (IUB) is a leading private university in Bangladesh, offering a liberal arts-based education with a strong emphasis on research and global engagement.

universities.name: East West University

units.name: Undergraduate Admissions
units.details: Programs in Business, Engineering & Technology, Liberal Arts & Social Sciences.

universities.description: East West University (EWU) is a private university in Bangladesh, established in 1996. It is known for its academic excellence and diverse programs.

universities.name: Jagannath University
universities.description: Jagannath University is a public university in Dhaka, Bangladesh. It was established as a college in 1868 and was upgraded to a full-fledged university in 2005.

universities.name: Bangladesh Agricultural University
universities.description: Bangladesh Agricultural University (BAU) is a public university in Bangladesh, established in 1961. It is the premier agricultural education and research institution in the country.

universities.name: Chittagong Veterinary and Animal Sciences University

units.name: FMS
units.details: Faculty of Food Science and Technology

universities.description: Chittagong Veterinary and Animal Sciences University (CVASU) is a public university in Bangladesh focused on veterinary medicine, animal science, and food science.

universities.name: Noakhali Science and Technology University
universities.description: Noakhali Science and Technology University (NSTU) is a public university in Bangladesh. It offers a wide range of programs in science, technology, and other disciplines.

universities.name: Pabna University of Science and Technology
universities.description: Pabna University of Science and Technology (PUST) is a public university in Bangladesh, established in 2008, focusing on science and technology education.

universities.name: Jessore University of Science & Technology

units.name: Applied Science
units.details: Applied science and technology related programs

universities.description: Jessore University of Science & Technology (JUST) is a public university in Bangladesh, established in 2007, promoting scientific and technological education.

universities.name: Bangladesh University of Textiles

units.name: Textile Engineering
units.details: Specialized programs in textile engineering and fashion design.

universities.description: Bangladesh University of Textiles (BUTEX) is the only public university in Bangladesh specializing in textile education.

universities.name: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University

units.name: Medical and Dental Admission
units.details: Postgraduate courses in various medical specialties.

universities.description: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU) is the first public medical university in Bangladesh, offering postgraduate medical education and research.

universities.name: Bangladesh University of Professionals
universities.description: Bangladesh University of Professionals (BUP) is a public university run by the Armed Forces of Bangladesh. It offers a wide range of undergraduate and graduate programs.

universities.name: Military Institute of Science and Technology

units.name: Engineering Programs
units.details: Various engineering disciplines including Civil, Mechanical, CSE, EEE, Aeronautical, etc.

universities.description: Military Institute of Science and Technology (MIST) is a public engineering institute in Bangladesh, offering technical education under the Bangladesh Armed Forces.

universities.name: Gopalganj Science and Technology University
universities.description: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University (BSMRSTU), commonly known as Gopalganj Science and Technology University (GSTU), is a public university in Gopalganj, Bangladesh.

universities.name: Mawlana Bhashani Science and Technology University
universities.description: Mawlana Bhashani Science and Technology University (MBSTU) is a public university in Tangail, Bangladesh, focusing on science and technology education.

universities.name: Patuakhali Science And Technology University
universities.description: Patuakhali Science And Technology University (PSTU) is a public university in Patuakhali, Bangladesh, with a focus on science, technology, and agricultural education.

universities.name: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University

units.name: Agricultural Sciences
units.details: Programs in agriculture, fisheries, and animal science.

universities.description: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University (SAU) is a public agricultural university in Dhaka, Bangladesh, offering specialized education in agricultural sciences.

universities.name: Comilla University

units.name: Arts, Social Science & Business
units.details: Faculties in humanities, social sciences, and business administration.

universities.description: Comilla University (CoU) is a public university located in Comilla, Bangladesh, established in 2006, offering a range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs.

universities.name: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University

units.name: Arts
units.details: Various departments in Arts and Humanities.

universities.description: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (JKKNIU) is a public university in Trishal, Mymensingh, Bangladesh, named after the national poet Kazi Nazrul Islam.

universities.name: Islamic University, Bangladesh
universities.description: Islamic University, Bangladesh (IU) is a public university in Kushtia, Bangladesh, with a strong focus on Islamic studies alongside modern disciplines.

universities.name: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur

units.name: Science
units.details: Faculties related to science and engineering.

units.name: Arts & Social Sciences
units.details: Humanities, social sciences, and business faculties.

universities.description: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (BRUR) is a public university in Rangpur, Bangladesh, established in 2008, named after the pioneer of women's rights in Bengal.

universities.name: University of Barishal

units.name: Arts, Business & Social Sciences
units.details: Humanities, business administration, and social sciences faculties.

universities.description: University of Barishal (BU) is a public university in Barishal, Bangladesh, established in 2011, offering diverse academic programs.
